title: Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program Using Technology-Enabled Active Learning (TEAL)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts (equations, functions, geometry)
context.additional_context: Customized Education Course for Corporate Job-Relevant Mathematics Competency Development, Utilizing Actual Work Cases as Project Themes

learning_goals: Learners can improve critical thinking skills required to solve complex mathematical problems through collaboration with peers in TEAL environments by 80% or more
Learners can perform mathematical modeling processes with 90% accuracy using digital tools (graphing calculators, simulation software, etc.)
Learners can structure mathematical logic and explain it within three minutes during project presentations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
